title: President Donald J. Trump Signs S. 496 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
May 12, 2017
On Friday, May 12, 2017, the President signed into law:S. 496, which nullifies the rule issued by the Federal Highway Administration and the Federal Transit Administration entitled “Metropolitan Planning Organization Coordination and Planning Area Reform”.
